attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxed out of existence, we now support our debt-ridden unemployed, depressed, disaffected sons and daughters  who have worked incessantly to gain one qualification after another, only to be saddled with student loan debts and the humiliation of the dole queue. We petition the Government to set up sustainable long term  strategies, guided by experts who together understand the wider picture. We need absolute transparency and zero tolerance for those who cheat the system. Government must lift the spirit of the nation and give confidence and a future to the young so that they can find work, achieve a high quality of life and a good standard of living, independently of their middle class parents who currently support them in every way, but at what cost?

rejection.details: Please be more specific about how you suggest the Government support young people and resubmit your petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
